attributes.action: stop giving cheap homes to foreign residents - 3+ bedroom homes for £50,000 to get foreign residents on ladder
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the government of this country are helping foreign residents coming to Great Britain get on the property ladder by giving them 3+ bedroom homes for approx £50,000. These should be given to British people only who work and have always paid taxes not to immigrants

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
